mapper.select: select 'true' as QUERYID, sid, sensor_no, type, start_dt, day, avg_num, ghb, standard_val, awi_time_rate_of_normal, awi_time_rate_of_high, awi_time_rate_of_low, event_count_of_normal, event_count_of_high, event_count_of_low, avg_awi_time_of_normal, avg_awi_time_of_high, avg_awi_time_of_low, mean_amplitude_of_glycemic_excursion, awi_time_rate_of_4_0, awi_time_rate_of_13_9, awi_time_rate_of_3_9, coefficient_of_variation, is_valid, insert_dt, modify_dt from dy_yp_statistics where is_valid = 1 and sid = #{sid}
